text: Peter Weibel (14 September 1950 - 9 August 2017) was a German cyclist. He was born in Hockenheim, Germany. He competed for West Germany at the 1972 Summer Olympics and the 1976 Summer Olympics. Weibel died of cancer on 9 August 2017 at the age of 66.Früherer Rad-Trainer Weibel verstorben ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Baden-Württemberg Category:Cancer deaths in Germany
title: Peter Weibel (cyclist)
